spell.name: Fuet d'Ego
entries: You lash the mind of one creature you can see within range, filling it with despair. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws, and it can't cast spells. Al final de cada torn seu, l'objectiu pot repetir la salvada per Intel·ligència. Si supera, el conjur es cancel·la per a l'objectiu.

spell.name: Insinuació d'Id
entries: You unleash a torrent of conflicting desires in the mind of one creature you can see within range, impairing its ability to make decisions. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa or be incapacitated. At the end of each of its turns, it takes {@damage 1d12} de dany psíquic, and it can then make another Saviesa saving throw. Si supera, el conjur es cancel·la per a l'objectiu.

spell.name: Fortalesa Intel·lectual
entries: You create a faintly shimmering barrier of protective psychic power around you. For the duration, you have advantage on all saving throws.
When another creature that you can see within 30 feet of you fails a saving throw, you can use your reaction to allow them to reroll the save. They must use the new roll.

spell.name: Mental Barrier

time.condition: which you take when you are forced to make an salvada per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, o Carisma

entries: You protect your mind with a wall of looping, repetitive thought. Until the start of your next turn, you have advantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws, and you have resistance to psychic damage.

spell.name: Estella Mental
entries: Claves una estaca d'energia psíquica a la ment d'una criatura que puguis veure a l'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic, i a la primera tirada de salvació que faci abans que acabi el teu proper torn li ha de restar {@dice d4}.
El dany del conjur incrementa en {@dice 1d6} quan arribes a nivell 5 ({@damage 2d6}), nivell 11 ({@damage 3d6}) i nivell 17 ({@damage 4d6})

spell.name: Desestabilització Cerebral
entries: You propel a lance of psionic disruption into the mind of one creature you can see within range. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany psíquic, and it can use its action only to {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} on its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and this spell doesn't limit its action options.

entriesHigherLevel.name: A Nivells Superiors
entries: Quan llances aquest conjur emprant una ranura de nivell 3 o superior, pots designar una criatura adicional per cada nivell per sobre de 2. Les criatures han d'estar a 30 peus les unes de les altres quan llances el conjur.

spell.name: Psionic Blast
entries: You unleash a destructive wave of mental power en un con de 30 peus. Each creature in the area ha de salvar per Destresa. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d8} de dany de força, is pushed 20 feet directly away from you, and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

entriesHigherLevel.name: A Nivells Superiors
entries: Quan llances aquest conjur emprant una ranura de nivell 4 o superior, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} per cada nivell per sobre de 3.

spell.name: Psychic Crush
entries: You overload the mind of one creature you can see within range, filling its psyche with discordant emotions. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 12d6} de dany psíquic and is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.
The stunned target can make an Intel·ligència saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the spell ends on the target.

spell.name: Thought Shield
entries: You weave a clouding veil over the mind of one creature you touch. For the duration, the target's mind can't be read or detected, creatures can't telepathically communicate with the target unless the target allows it, and the target has advantage on saving throws against any effect that would determine whether it is telling the truth.
